UM

Company

The Company section stores the official details of the organisation using Unit Master, which are used on statements, reports and client communications.

What is the Company section?

The Company page is where administrators capture and maintain the master information about the organisation that operates the fund or investment product. This information is reused across the system wherever the company name and contact details need to appear.

Keeping this page up to date ensures that all statements, reports and automated communications display the correct legal name, address and contact information.

View and update Company details

The Company section stores general details about the organisation using Unit Master. Typical information includes:

  • Company or organisation name
  • Registration and contact details (such as registration number, phone, email)
  • Physical and postal address
  • Other general information that should appear on client statements or reports

When you open the Company page, you can review the existing information and make changes where necessary.

After updating the fields, save the changes so that all future statements, reports and system communications use the correct company details.
